thread.section_title: The Logo Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Logo Company | thelogocompany.net
thread.title: Pat Flynn
thread.title_full: The Logo Company reviewed by Pat Flynn

author: Pat Flynn
title: Pat Flynn
text: I don't know how you guys did it, but phenomenal job capturing everything I wanted in my logo, style, design, and content in only two revisions. Your company was recommended to me by a friend of my who is a website designer and I couldn't be happier with my logo and decision to work with you. Great job, would recommend to anybody starting a business who needs your services.
